mapper.select: SELECT ub.*,uh.*, ( SELECT ui.nickname FROM user_info ui WHERE uh.purchase_uid=ui.uid ) AS purUname, ( SELECT ui.nickname FROM user_info ui WHERE uh.sell_uid=ui.uid ) AS sellUname, ( SELECT ui.mobile FROM user_info ui WHERE uh.purchase_uid=ui.uid ) AS purMobile, ( SELECT ui.mobile FROM user_info ui WHERE uh.sell_uid=ui.uid ) AS sellMobile FROM user_buy_history uh left join user_buy ub on ub.id = uh.user_buy_id where uh.user_buy_id = #{id}
